summary: Six college students on a road trip take a wrong turn and end up trapped in a strangely deserted rural town inhabited by a murdeous cult of children.
cast: Stacy Galina|Alexis Arquette|Eva Mendes|Greg Vaughan|Angela Jones|Ahmet Zappa|Fred Williamson|Dave Buzzotta|Olivia Burnette|Adam Wylie|David Carradine|Aaron Jackson|Matthew Tait|Kane Hodder|Jennifer Badger|Hiro Koda|Frank Lloyd|Gary Bullock|Season Hubley|Edward Edwards|Sicily Johnson|Diva Zappa|Christopher Stinson|Danny Goldring|Deborah Strang
keywords: based on the works of stephen king|violence|surrealism|blood|young adults
